div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1783 Warka (anc. Orchi or Uruk), Baby- (1171) lonia, 1912 Burial: c. 100-75 B.C. (Le Rider) Contents: 1 AR, 190 AE Antiochus IV?: 1 AE Alexander I Bala?: 2 AE Antiochus VII?: 1 tetradr. Mithradates II?: 1 AE Unc. Arsacids: 3 AE King Eudi: 1 AE Unc.: 182 AE Disposition: Paris de la Fuÿe, MMAP 1934, p. 10 † Le Rider, Suse, pp. 458 f., illus.
